
Two agents picked random keys, but reused a prime by mistake. Can you decrypt their intercepted message? Ciphertext: 342447216479268717490706480126692571029639359925063912173775206692548840148916770132374774854439419680260768476785423936175541516812210960883573586848292540669982574696624806686270367092670241430684337953331268996363460745007305757


The flag format is flag{...}
n=829017033944996031414459888504444819869944768054636075966204634120972552716436686533753207543359208773163490893388712161178446221775144059302328345830142703250100274552073067863964869182944435173576101348384255684547898535129477139, n2=502160145766206408078676902799130660021844031270063934643306240301538001122588695340170606577948028168441792613211315818325421681515772611359095447161131764337525684660262164866346779335636971949389910436344998626921600976110596921, e=170616107529611691783244908649129114808510234411951602208592223348522973761346387645443127942069023873030798826939310755464856560760728078121554282143911959541374130130272327095391450397299600787984664676621246764424179601517257195

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{4bs4xfcx}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 342447216479268717490706480126692571029639359925063912173775206692548840148916770132374774854439419680260768476785423936175541516812210960883573586848292540669982574696624806686270367092670241430684337953331268996363460745007305757
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=829017033944996031414459888504444819869944768054636075966204634120972552716436686533753207543359208773163490893388712161178446221775144059302328345830142703250100274552073067863964869182944435173576101348384255684547898535129477139, n2=502160145766206408078676902799130660021844031270063934643306240301538001122588695340170606577948028168441792613211315818325421681515772611359095447161131764337525684660262164866346779335636971949389910436344998626921600976110596921, e=170616107529611691783244908649129114808510234411951602208592223348522973761346387645443127942069023873030798826939310755464856560760728078121554282143911959541374130130272327095391450397299600787984664676621246764424179601517257195
extra_info: p=22942285269340543558886562947122518712788306229964742582818604276703118979362525449016632501220934911534903953833613, q=36134893460368232081347820029197048671260324815799457163102443390488634282551226151943838712066947469404652504355103, q2=21887974099828659901487355049478387309808986180798609334866054962265957826972375688792433805507461434668360097063517, φ(n)=829017033944996031414459888504444819869944768054636075966204634120972552716436686533753207543359208773163490893388653083999716512999503824919352026262758654619054510352327146816297677429682521421975140877170967802166958978671288424, φ(n2)=502160145766206408078676902799130660021844031270063934643306240301538001122588695340170606577948028168441792613211270988066052512312312237441098846255109167045114921308344480207107810258830637048252101370038270230575397712059699792

archetype: rsa
